{"id":864966409,"question_id":26,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 year, 5 months","timestamp":1671919412,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"11 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/864966409/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Remove Duplicates from Sorted Array","memory":"43.7 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int removeDuplicates(int[] nums) {\n        int size = nums.length;\n        int numRmvd = 0;\n        for(int i = 0; i + numRmvd < size; i++) {\n            numRmvd += removeFollowingElements(nums, i+1, size - numRmvd, nums[i]);\n        }\n        return size - numRmvd;\n    }\n    public int removeFollowingElements(int[] nums, int start, int stop, int val) {\n        int size = nums.length;\n        int numRmvd = 0;\n        for(int i = start; i + numRmvd < stop; i++) {\n            while((i + numRmvd) <= stop - 1 && nums[i + numRmvd] == val) {\n                numRmvd++;\n            }\n            nums[i] = nums[Math.min(i + numRmvd, stop - 1)];\n        }\n        return numRmvd;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"remove-duplicates-from-sorted-array","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
